TopicTitle: Any way to mute the game when it's minimized?

Articles.Content:
Title. It was like that in the earlier versions but not anymore. Any way to do it? Browsing the forums with bird and cattle sounds is not my cup of tea.

I know I can do it manually with the volume mixer but that's tedious.

As far as I know you have to do it manually, but if there is a hotkey I would probably use it. I've just been muting my entire computer when I alt-tab, an in-game option would be nice but not a big deal imo.
